com.schlimm.springcdi.decorator.strategies
Interface DecoratorChainingStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleDecoratorChainingStrategy
public interface DecoratorChainingStrategy

Strategy that chains decorators and the delegate. Implementations perform the actual injection (1) of the chained decorator and (2) the delegate into the last decorator in the chain.

Author:
Niklas Schlimm

Method Summary
 Object getChainedDecorators(org.springframework.beans.factory.config.ConfigurableListableBeanFactory beanFactory, QualifiedDecoratorChain chain, Object delegate)
          Injects the decorators into each other in the order given in the QualifiedDecoratorChain.
 

Method Detail

getChainedDecorators

Object getChainedDecorators(org.springframework.beans.factory.config.ConfigurableListableBeanFactory beanFactory,
                            QualifiedDecoratorChain chain,
                            Object delegate)
Injects the decorators into each other in the order given in the QualifiedDecoratorChain.

Parameters:
beanFactory - current bean factory that knows the decorators
chain - QualifiedDecoratorChain that carries the decorator meta data
delegate - the decorated target bean
Returns:
the decorator chain
